cast.name: 迈克尔·G·纳森森 Michael G. Nathanson
克莱伯恩·埃尔德 Claybourne Elder

writer.name: 卡斯帕·安德瑞斯 Casper Andreas

director.name: 卡斯帕·安德瑞斯 Casper Andreas

introduction: Former Wall Street hotshot Jimmy and his buttoned-up cousin Max make meager livings as telephone repairmen in their native Brooklyn neighborhood, slaving away to meet the demands of their increasingly yuppie clientele. Jimmy wants nothing more than to return to his fast-paced high life, while Max is starting to have second thoughts about his upcoming - and very expensive - wedding. When Jimmy overhears illegal insider trading during a routine house call, he convinces Max that they should tap the phone line to cash in on the scheme - hoping the money will solve their problems. But when stock tips turn to murder plots, the hapless men are unable to go to the police and soon find themselves in over their heads and flat out of luck.
